videos.title: Implement App Store Offers
videos.description: Learn how to engage customers with App Store Offers using App Store Connect, as well as the latest StoreKit features and APIs. videos.description: Discover how Xcode Cloud can adapt to your development needs. We'll show you how to streamline your workflows, automate testing and distribution with start conditions, custom aliases, custom scripts, webhooks, and the App Store Connect API.

videos.title: What’s new in USD and MaterialX
videos.description: Explore updates to Universal Scene Description and MaterialX support on Apple platforms. videos.description: Learn how to capture high dynamic colors using ScreenCaptureKit, and explore new features like HDR support, microphone capture, and straight-to-file recording.

videos.description: Every app has a personality that comes across in what you say — and how you say it. videos.description: Discover how intelligent tracking in DockKit allows for smoother transitions between subjects. We will cover what intelligent tracking is, how it uses an ML model to select and track subjects, and how you can use it in your app.

videos.description: Learn how to train your models on Apple Silicon with Metal for PyTorch, JAX and TensorFlow. Take advantage of new attention operations and quantization support for improved transformer model performance on your devices.

videos.title: Use CloudKit Console to monitor and optimize database activity
videos.description: Discover the new observability features in CloudKit Console. videos.description: Explore new features for discovery, testing, and marketing. videos.description: Discover how to create stunning visual effects in SwiftUI. Learn to build unique scroll effects, rich color treatments, and custom transitions. We'll also explore advanced graphic effects using Metal shaders and custom text rendering.

videos.description: Discover powerful new ways to integrate maps into your apps and websites with MapKit and MapKit JS.  Learn how to save and reference unique places using Place ID. videos.description: Learn how you can design a compelling interactive narrative experience for Apple Vision Pro from the designers of Encounter Dinosaurs. videos.description: Learn how to build and deliver even better purchase experiences using the App Store In-App Purchase system. videos.description: Harness the power of WeatherKit to get detailed weather forecast data such as precipitation amounts by type, cloud cover by altitude, or maximum wind speed. videos.description: Explore how HLS Interstitials can help you seamlessly insert advertisements into your HLS content. We'll also show you how to use integrated timeline to tune your UI experience and build SharePlay for interstitials.
